mmud.rest.services

Class GuildBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • mmud.rest.services.GuildBean

  • @Path(value="/private/{name}/guild")
public class GuildBean
extends Object
    Takes care of the guilds. All the REST services in this bean, can be subdivided into two categories:
    • persons who are a member of the guild, can view information of the guild
    • guildmasters (who are also member of the guild) can change/delete/add information to the guild
    TODO: need to add different access rights.
    Author:
    maartenl

        Returns:

      • getGuild

        @GET
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public PrivateGuild getGuild(@PathParam(value="name")
                                 String name,
                                 @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                 String lok)
        Get the guild of the user.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        Returns:
        the guild

      • updateGuild

        @PUT
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateGuild(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                 String name,
                                                 @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                                 String lok,
                                                 PrivateGuild cinfo)
        Updates the guild.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the user
        lok - the session password
        cinfo - the guild object containing the new stuff to update.
        Returns:
        Response.ok if everything is okay.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException - UNAUTHORIZED, if the authorisation failed. BAD_REQUEST if an unexpected exception crops up.

      • deleteMember

        @DELETE
@Path(value="members/{membername}")
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteMember(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                          String name,
                                                          @PathParam(value="membername")

      • createMember

        @POST
@Path(value="members")
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createMember(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                        String name,
                                                        @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                                        String lok,
                                                        PrivatePerson member)
        Adds a member to the guild of the user. There are some checks made:
        • possible member should exist
        • should be a user, not a bot
        • should not be a member of a guild
        • should have a guildwish corresponding to the name of the guild>/li>
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        member - the member to add, really should contain only the name, that's enough
        Returns:
        Response.ok if everything is okay.

      • updateMember

        @PUT
@Path(value="members/{membername}")
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateMember(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                       String name,
                                                       @PathParam(value="membername")
                                                       String membername,
                                                       @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                                       String lok,
                                                       PrivatePerson member)
        Set or deletes the rank of a member of the guild of the user.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        membername - the name of the guild member, to set the guild rank for
        member - the member object that contains the changes
        name - the name of the user
        Returns:
        Response.ok() if everything's okay.

      • getGuildHopefuls

        @GET
@Path(value="hopefuls")
@Consumes(value={"application/xml","application/json"})
public List<PrivatePerson> getGuildHopefuls(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                     String name,
                                                     @QueryParam(value="lok")
                                                     String lok)
        Get the hopefuls of the guild of the user.
        Parameters:
        lok - the hash to use for verification of the user, is the lok setting in the cookie when logged onto the game.
        name - the name of the user
        Returns:
        list of hopefuls, i.e. people who wish to join the guild
